tte_conf_t Struct Reference
[TTEthernet API Common Data Types]

#include <tte_api.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

uint32_t * data
uint32_t length

Detailed Description

Container for a controller configuration block. The format of the configuration block depends on the communication controller type and is described in the controller specification.

Definition at line 423 of file tte_api.h.

Member Data Documentation

uint32_t* tte_conf_t::data

Address of the configuration block. The 32-bit words must be stored in the native byte order.

Definition at line 426 of file tte_api.h.
